name: Mitigation Playbook for RDP Exploitation Incident
description: This playbook addresses the incident of unauthorized access via a misconfigured remote desktop protocol, followed by script execution and data exfiltration.

action--1e2d4f7b-4a1c-456e-9004-d3c75b2b.name: Terminate Unauthorized Remote Desktop Sessions
action--1e2d4f7b-4a1c-456e-9004-d3c75b2b.description: Terminate all remote desktop connections established by unauthorized users.

action--66cf8b24-4e0d-4319-9806-a0470927.name: Remove Unauthorized User Accounts
action--66cf8b24-4e0d-4319-9806-a0470927.description: Delete any malicious user accounts created during the incident.

action--c5c2e5ae-29f9-418c-a92b-8641d9c6.name: Scan System for Remaining Malicious Scripts
action--c5c2e5ae-29f9-418c-a92b-8641d9c6.description: Conduct a scan of the system to identify any residual malicious scripts.

while-condition--ba8fe32a-9cb3-42e0-8c8b.name: Checking for Malware
while-condition--ba8fe32a-9cb3-42e0-8c8b.description: Loop until no malware is found in the system.

action--f27a58c0-5b25-4d35-9b68-6b601517.name: Deploy Network Monitoring to Detect Data Exfiltration
action--f27a58c0-5b25-4d35-9b68-6b601517.description: Set up monitoring tools to detect any further data exfiltration attempts.

action--3c6e5a2f-b3ab-400a-bd18-656e2d06.name: Reset RDP access policies and enhance logging
action--3c6e5a2f-b3ab-400a-bd18-656e2d06.description: Reconfigure RDP access settings and improve logging for future incidents.

commands.command: sudo ufw deny 3389 && sudo systemctl restart rsyslog
